item_category: The HUAWEI MatePad T is a 9.7-inch tablet with a high-performing octa-core Kirin 710A processor. It has a high screen-to-body ratio, multi-layered eye protection and is tuned by Harman Kardon.
review_text:
I have returned this tab as its did not work as I would have liked.
I am use to using Android/Google play store and this tab did not have this function. It runs Huawei own app store which seems to prevent you from using all Google apps (doc, maps, app store, ect...)

Bought this tablet thinking it was a good buy I was wrong if you have a huwei  phone then you might like this tablet I returned it cannot download nothing onto it from Google unless you are a expert with gadgets it got a nice screen and sound that's all it's good for
I brought 2 weeks ago and is amazing
I bought this from Argos 2 weeks ago, the best tablet I had.
